title: How a simple pendulum inside a running elevator oscillates
abstract:
We propose to effectively realize a time-dependent gravitational acceleration
by using a running elevator, so that a simple pendulum inside it effectively
becomes one with a time-dependent gravitational acceleration. We did such an
experiment using a realistic elevator, and analyzed the data. The acceleration
of an elevator is much smaller than the gravitational acceleration, and is
time-dependent only when the elevator starts and stops. However, we have
managed to establish the effect on the oscillation of the pendulum. The effect
becomes pronounced if the simple pendulum is put in a container vertically
accelerating, and the acceleration is time-dependent, while its magnitude is
comparable with that of the gravitational acceleration.
